Dear Colleagues,
 
As we continue to grow and strengthen our online and offline presence, we are aware that cyber threats are more prevalent than ever, constantly evolving and becoming increasingly sophisticated in both our personal and professional environments.
 
Protecting our assets and reputation is essential to our long-term success and business resilience. This commitment extends beyond our everyday operations; it’s not just about ticking a box, but rather reinforcing a security-first mindset.
 
Our new Information Security Charter serves as a foundation for our ongoing commitment to a proactive and comprehensive approach to protecting Group information and business operations. This charter aims to uphold the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of our information assets while fostering a culture of security awareness, maintaining regulatory compliance, and most importantly upholding the trust of our customers, partners, team members and stakeholders.
